page.title: 12RECREATION: A Local Walk
page.content: Several years ago the line from Bury to Holcombe Brook closed, recently renovated as a nature walk and all that remains are signal points along the line. Leaving Brandlesholme road we walked past the former Greenmount Station. Looking left we see Greenmount Cricket club and right, a housing estate. Shortly we reach crossroads, right leads to Holcombe Road, left to Tower farm, we continue ahead to the viaduct. From here we overlook the reservoirs and island lodge,a small island with evident wildlife. Half way across the viaduct is a signal point, also a sign of Victorian Lancashire, a chimney stack,and factory. Later walking under a bridge we approach Tottington.
